text: I will also think that uh um we are
going to look back on these years of the

we've had leaders who have brought us

country ended up endorsing the Iraq

think we are going to pay a price for 20
30 40 a whole generation it took us what

to rebuild the military get out of the
Iraq syndrome and maybe at the end of
